name: Tazz
description:
Conversion of the Commodore 64 arcade game Tazz.

Keyboard Controls
Cursor/WASD to move.
Space to shoot.
Shift to use a bomb.

Controller Support
D Pad/Left Stick/Right Stick to move.
Right Trigger to shoot.
Left Trigger to use a bomb.

Kill the little bugs, avoid the big buggers. When all the bugs are dead leave the room before you get squished.
